document_data.name: Sautéed Canard
document_data.mainbody: '''Sautéed Canard''' was a fanciful fowl dish from the lands around [[Neverwinter]] near the end of the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The dish consisted of thinly sliced flesh of a [[duck]], sautéed and simmered in a rich sauce of [[honey]] and red [[wine]].
